Name: Dogma
About the game: Dogma is a 2d puzzle platformer with a unique grab and pivot mechanic. Take control of Jacko the dog as he travels through 6 different worlds to save his human friend. You'll need to be quick on your feet to get through the 60 levels full of puzzles and challenges to win!
